text: Little Fockers is a 2010 American comedy movie set in Chicago. It is the sequel to Meet the Parents and Meet the Fockers. It stars Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Jessica Alba, Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand.Meet the Parents: Little Fockers UK site , with "DW Studios" mentioned in copyright line ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2010 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Little Fockers
